CustomField.description: If WO has Service Contract and is in status category New or In Progress derive Service Contract SC Block value, otherwise set it by default to false.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(StatusCategory, "New") , ISPICKVAL(StatusCategory, "In Progress")), NOT( ISNULL( ServiceContractId))) , ServiceContract.GDMFSL_SC_Block__c, false)
CustomField.label: SC Block
